definition: A term used to describe the natural color or complexion of a person's skin, typically referring to the shade or tone. It is commonly used in the context of discussing beauty, cosmetics, or skincare.

examples.german: Sie benutzt eine Creme für einen ebenmäßigen Teint.
examples.english: She uses a cream for an even complexion.

examples.german: Sein Teint wirkt frisch und strahlend.
examples.english: His complexion looks fresh and radiant.

examples.german: Sie hat einen natürlichen Teint ohne Make-up.
examples.english: She has a natural complexion without makeup.
